evidence.text: The Consent Decree mandates quarterly reports from the Compliance Officer (Paragraph 38), but contains no actual monitor reports. The document outlines reporting requirements without including any specific reports or findings.

No court-appointed or agreed-upon monitor is named in the Consent Decree. The document specifies that the City shall designate a 'Consent Decree Compliance Officer' (Paragraph 37), but provides no specific name for this role.
